name: Digital-marketing-courses-bangalore
tagline: Learn Digital Marketing Course and Promote your Business/Services/Products Online on WEB. Increase visitors, increase sales and Revenue
body:
online Marketing SEO & Google Adwords Training Announcement 

Dear Student,
Hope you are doing good,
 
We are pleased to offer this opportunity to announce the Training & Technical Assistance of  [Digital Marketing Courses in Bangalore](http://www.inventateq.com/internet-marketing-training-courses-bangalore.php) , SEO & SEM.  

Topic covered will be:

1) SEO
2) SEM/PPC/Google Adwords
3) Email Marketing
4) Affiliate Marketing
5) Social Media Marketing (Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google plus)
6) Online Reputation Management
7) Google Maps
8) Google Adsence
9) Web Analytics
10) Youtube Marketing
11) Display Advertisement
12) Mobile Apps Promotions

Book your FREE DEMO Class now

Call us 7676765421 , 080-42024661. Kindly check google maps for address.

The Training is designed as Flexible as to meet the demands of fresherâ€™s and working professionals. It offers a number of Advanced & Corporate [SEO Training courses](http://www.inventateq.com/seo-training.php) to help you take advantage of and develop your own in-house or personal knowledge base in search engine optimizations, either to further the benefit of your own organization, or as part of your personal development and career strategy in web design, development or online marketing.
 

 Batch starts on this week, limited seats are available. Feel free to call us for more information.

 
Timings & Schedules:
 The Training is clubbed with Theory and Lab sessions. A total of 35  -  40 Hrs training is scheduled in Classes. The Classes are scheduled on weekdays OR Weekends Saturdays & Sundays.
 
Student Benefits:

1)      Both weekdays / Weekend Classes
2)      LAB Facilities
3)      Certification
4)      Flexible Payment Option
5)      Advanced Course
6)      SEO Materials/Books
7)      Live Hands on Experience
8)      100% Placement Assistance
9)      Live Projects to work on..
 
      And Many More Benefits you get


 Information on Admission & Training Enrollment
 Those candidates who wish to enroll and attend the Training programe, please contact  info@inventateq.com , 
+91  - 8050585880 ,080-42108236, 080 - 41502315
 
The Physical address of the Training Institute is also mentioned here under.  The candidates can also walk in to the Institute to enroll the name.
 
 
It would be great if you can provide an opportunity to best take care of your  career growth in evergreen Internet Marketing (SEO/SEM) Platform.
